title: Shape of Nightmares
description: Four years after their traumatic separation, Thaleon and Dawyn have settled into their new lives, each believing the other dead.Thaleon continues his studies at Allesdale. No longer a novice mage, his life has taken on a comfortable routine of magic lessons and working in the infirmary.Dawyn is making the best of his life in the one place he never wished to be—the Crown’s army. His days are filled with endless training and lessons to prepare him for the life of hunting down rogue mages.Unexpected events shatter the calm of their new lives. Thaleon must leave the safety of Allesdale and embark on a hopeless quest to Taliehin—the frozen wasteland of ice and monsters. Dawyn must face impossible odds in a brutal fight for his life and that of a friend's.
author: N.K. Leem
